metadata.synopsis: Gith kid comments about the gremishka coming out of the chest.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Unlock the Mage Hand kids' chest or use a spell near it.

0.speaker: Zel'i
0.context: NodeContext: Thinks this is one of the most hilarious things she's ever seen; knew that a gremishka was going to jump out at the player

1.speaker: Zel'i
1.text: Look what you did, k'chakhi! Look!
1.context: NodeContext: Gloating; knew that a gremishka was going to jump out at the player
